item.title: Writing IEEE Standard Academic Papers in Markdown
item.description: Writing IEEE Standard Academic Papers in Markdown Motivation To have a simple text based system to write academic papers and not worry about the formatting. At the end we could generate a pdf properly formatted as per IEEE standard and works across platforms making the entire setup portable. Bring back the focus on writing the content than spending time on formatting the document. The Setup Mostly follow up the link to install required software.
